message:
FABJ-434 Expose org info for peers

Change-Id: Ie346fa5d45089f4d0a86c9daf011bf5baffc5e67
Signed-off-by: rickr <cr22rc@gmail.com>

added: this.properties = properties == null ? new Properties() : (Properties) properties.clone(); //keep our own copy.
this.properties = properties == null ? new Properties() : properties;
ltoString = "Peer{ id: " + id + ", name: " + name + ", channelName: " + channelName + ", url: " + url + mspid + "}";
deleted: this.properties = properties == null ? null : (Properties) properties.clone(); //keep our own copy.
return "Peer{ id: " + id + ", name: " + name + ", channelName: " + channelName + ", url: " + url + "}";
